name: Synth Riders
abstract: Let the music move you as you catch notes, ride the rails, and dodge obstacles in a unique combination of freestyle dancing & fitness workout with 68+ included songs and 10-player multiplayer!

detail.app_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, German, French, Spanish, Japanese, Korean
detail.app_release_note:
Major Update - Version 3.2.2

Pico receives a major update bringing it right up to date with our other platforms!

This update includes:
* Technical infrastructure changes
* Major visual enhancements to UI, stages
* Performance improvements in all areas
* Gameplay improvements
* Accessibility improvements
* New cross-platform social features!
* Multiplayer enhancements
* Custom Stage changes

For more details, please join us in the Synth Riders communities on your favourite social media platforms!

PLEASE NOTE:
* Due to necessary changes in the game engine needed for this update, ALL pre-existing custom stages will not work with this version.  This is the only custom content which is affected by this update.
* We have been working closely with members of the stage making community in since April to support them in converting their stages ready for this new version, and many new updates are available for you to enjoy now!
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo2, PICO Neo2 Lite, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
